title: K-12 Creative Math Problem-Solving Improvement Program Using the PENTI Learning Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematics concepts (functions, geometry, statistics) and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Collaboration tool usage via smartphones and execution of field-immersive projects

learning_goals: Enhances creative thinking skills to transform real-life problems into mathematical modeling
Develops the ability to generate and evaluate diverse solution strategies through collaboration
Within one week, learners can solve three given math problems using smartphone apps (GeoGebra, Photomath, etc.), document step-by-step solutions, and submit final answers in a project report format.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
